summary: Evie stood in the dim light of the hallway, fear evident as she revealed to David, the new carpenter, the unsettling truth about the previous workers—nobody had searched for them when they vanished. Despite his wariness, David felt drawn to uncover the building’s mysteries. As David ventured through a warped door, he was immersed in memories of his past, recalling moments filled with joy and sorrow.
